attributes.action: redistribute wealth by a practical workable solution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As most of us know, 90% of this countries or the worlds wealth is owned by 10% of the people.

To counter balance this, a number of strategies and policies need to be implemented.

1, Create a policy that restricts foreign goods, in other words for every 6 products made, only 2 is allowed to be imported from a G8 country and one from elsewhere.
This will create jobs in this country by the bucket load.

2, Increase the national minimum wage to £7.50, and give the unemployed who have been out of work for 18 months or more a £ 5000 one off payment to start there own business on top of their dole money.

3, Have a policy where any one person earning more that 3 million pounds a year profit, will have to give the excess profit earned above that amount to a national wealth fund to be spent on public amenities, charities, homes, national transportation, health, national retirement pension fund etc.

4, Tax everyone on the goods or services they buy (10%), and do away with income tax.
